multiple_choice_question.text: What is the main point conveyed by the cartoon depicting the tobacco industry and low-tar cigarettes?
choices: Low-tar cigarettes are a genuine attempt by the tobacco industry to reduce harm.
The tobacco industry uses misleading tactics to promote low-tar cigarettes as safe.
Smokers are easily fooled by the tobacco industry\'s claims about low-tar cigarettes.
The government should regulate low-tar cigarettes more strictly.
